Uses of Class
org.gatein.api.site.SiteQuery.Builder

  • Packages that use SiteQuery.Builder 
    Package Description
    org.gatein.api.site  

    • Uses of SiteQuery.Builder in org.gatein.api.site

      Methods in org.gatein.api.site that return SiteQuery.Builder 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      SiteQuery.Builder SiteQuery.Builder.ascending()
      Sets the order of the sorting object of this builder to Sorting.Order.ascending
      SiteQuery.Builder SiteQuery.Builder.descending()
      Sets the order of the sorting object of this builder to Sorting.Order.descending
      SiteQuery.Builder SiteQuery.Builder.from(SiteQuery query)
      Creates a new builder from an existing SiteQuery.
      SiteQuery.Builder SiteQuery.Builder.includeEmptySites(boolean emptySites) 
      SiteQuery.Builder SiteQuery.Builder.withAllSiteTypes()
      Sets the site type's of this builder to include all SiteType's
      SiteQuery.Builder SiteQuery.Builder.withFilter(Filter<Site> filter)
      Sets the filter for this builder
      SiteQuery.Builder SiteQuery.Builder.withNextPage()
      Sets the pagination of this builder to pagination.getNext() if it's not null.
      SiteQuery.Builder SiteQuery.Builder.withPagination(int offset, int limit)
      Sets the pagination object of this builder to use the specified offset and limit.
      SiteQuery.Builder SiteQuery.Builder.withPagination(Pagination pagination)
      Sets the pagination object of this builder
      SiteQuery.Builder SiteQuery.Builder.withPreviousPage()
      Sets the pagination of this builder to pagination.getPrevious() if it's not null.
      SiteQuery.Builder SiteQuery.Builder.withSiteTypes(EnumSet<SiteType> siteTypes)
      Sets the site types of this builder.
      SiteQuery.Builder SiteQuery.Builder.withSiteTypes(SiteType first, SiteType... rest)
      Sets the site types of this builder
      SiteQuery.Builder SiteQuery.Builder.withSorting(Sorting<Site> sorting)
      Sets the sorting object for this builder
